titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Roscoe Harold Alcorn Papers, 1908-1963
titlestmt.author: Processed by Roger Simon

publicationstmt.publisher: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Roger Simon February 2019

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

did.abstract: A scrapbook of a newspaper publisher, state auditor, and legislator.

bioghist.head: Biography of Roscoe Harold Alcorn
bioghist.p: Roscoe Harold Alcorn was a newspaper publisher in Rawlins, Wyoming, and a Republican politician who served in the Wyoming legislature in 1921, 1923 and 1925. He also served as state auditor from 1929 to 1931.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: A scrapbook that includes photographs, documents related to Alcorn's military service, clippings related to his career as a newspaper publisher, state auditor, and legislator, and multiple newspaper articles acknowledging his death. Also includes as inserts multiple certificates awarded to Alcorn.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on the materials for research purposes, and the collection is open to the public.

userestrict.head: Copyright Information
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for observing all copyright, property, and libel laws as they apply.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: There are no known other archival collections created by Roscoe Harold Alcorn as of the date of processing.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The material was donated to the American Heritage Center by Louise B. Alcorn in 1973.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Roger Simon, February 2019. Finding aid encoded by Roger Simon, February 2019.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Item Description, Box Number, Collection Name, Collection Number, American Heritage Center, University of Wyoming.

note.p: Includes photographs, documents related to Alcorn's military service, clippings related to his career as a newspaper publisher, state auditor, and legislator, and multiple newspaper articles acknowledging his death. Also includes as inserts multiple certificates awarded to Alcorn.
